nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.actors

Class Chap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.actors.Chap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class Chap
extends java.util.Observable
implements Actor
    The playable character. It moves around the board and interacts with items and tiles.

      • getRequiredFeilds

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class<?>> getRequiredFeilds()
        Gets a map of the names of all the fields and their types (as Class objects) of this actor that are required to have a value. Used for checking the validity of ActorInfo (the description of an actor). The ActorInfo object MUST provide a value for these fields.
        Returns:
        a map of field names to their types

      • move

        public void move(Board board)
        Description copied from interface: Actor
        Moves the actor one step using a set of rules defined by the actor implementation. e.g for a bug move forward and turn when hit a wall or for chap move forward in current direction.
        Specified by:
        move in interface Actor
